additionalfeatures: Full HD Video with Stereo Sound, 18 Scene Modes
inbuiltflash: Yes, TTL auto flash with monitor preflashes
batterytype: Four Rechargeable EN-MH2 NiMH batteries, Four LR6/L40 (AA-size) alkaline batteries, Four FR6/L91 (AA-size) lithium batteries
range: 0.5 to 9.0 m [W]  (1 ft 8 in. to 29 ft),  1.5 to 4.5 m [T] (5 ft to 14 ft)
selftimer: Yes, Can be selected from 10 or 2 seconds duration
continuousshots: Up to 5 shots at approx. 6.7 frames per second
minimumshutterspeed: 4 sec (when scene mode is set to Fireworks show)
shootingmodes: Soft, Sepia, High Contrast Monochrome, High Key, Low Key, Selective Color, Pop, Super Vivid, Cross Process, Toy Camera Effect 1, Toy Camera Effect 2
